card component

< back to style guide

PROPS:

  • image (optional)
  • video - iframe url for youtube or vimeo (optional)
  • altText (optional, but highly recommend for SEO)
  • header (optional)
  • subtitle (optional)
  • title
  • link - entire card will be clickable to this URL (optional)
  • hasTextLink - if set to true, the card will display a "learn more" link (optional - the default is false)
Card Header
subtitle
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt.
